Function Documentation

◆ mlx_string_data()

const char * mlx_string_data ( mlx_string str)

Returns a pointer to the string contents.

The pointer is valid for the life duration of the string.

◆ mlx_string_free()

int mlx_string_free ( mlx_string str)

Free string.
